artist: Artist: Carlos Amorales; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Highpoint Editions Archive, The Friends of Bruce B. Dayton Acquisition Fund and the Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: A figure printed from two laser-engraved Plexiglas plates in the shape of a bird's head and woman's legs. The plates were inked and wiped intaglio style with black ink, relief rolled with transparent black ink, and printed. The intaglio printed black lines stand visibly on the relief printed flat.
image_copyright: Copyright © Carlos Amorales%2C published by Highpoint Editions
markings: LLC in pencil: ARCHIVE 1/2 | Publisher\'s blindstamp, LLC: HP
medium: Intaglio and relief printed from two laser-engraved acrylic templates
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2020.
signed: LRC in pencil: C. Amorales 2010 | BC in pencil: Hybrid Solid Compositions #3
title: Hybrid Solid Composition #3
